# Introduction {-}

This is the online companion for the book **Spatio-temporal methods in environmental epidemiology** published in [Chapman and Hall/CRC](https://www.taylorfrancis.com/books/mono/10.1201/b18600/spatio-temporal-methods-environmental-epidemiology-gavin-shaddick-james-zidek).

<a href="https://www.taylorfrancis.com/books/mono/10.1201/b18600/spatio-temporal-methods-environmental-epidemiology-gavin-shaddick-james-zidek"><img src="img/cover.jpg" width="250" height="375" alt="The book cover" align="right" style="margin: 0 1em 0 1em" /></a>

All the codes used for the examples in the book are presented here to ensure the material is reproducible, transparent, and accessible. 

Please feel free to contact us if you find any typos, or errors in our code *Errare humanum est*.

We would like to thank Yang ‘Seagle’ Liu, Yiping Dou, and Yi Liu for allowing us to include their code and other material in the book and in the online resources.

We would also like to thank [Sara Zapata-Marin](https://github.com/SaraZM), [Johnny Xi](https://xijohnny.github.io/),  [Paritosh Kumar Roy](https://github.com/paritoshkroy), and [Mariana Carmona Baez](https://github.com/mcarmonabaez) for their help developing some of the additional examples and exercises for this edition.
